## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c09616d1a3cf63c69efe5b81863fee024898fd16025a96efa3e70504012bb6bd)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'worldhello' @ 1.0.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
